title: Connection error
body: I cant login in client plz help  !  http://i.imgur.com/PPmnQSm.png

replies.body:
There are a number of reasons why you may not be able to log in. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over a lot of them, so I recommend giving those a go. There's also a known issue with some players trying to log in to EUNE, so if the guide doesn't resolve this issue for you, I recommend you reach out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the following information:

- Subject: "EUNE Login Issues"
- Your ISP
- What Country you are trying to connect from
- Your IP address as shown [HERE](http://whatismyip.com/)
- Your router/modem make and model

Let me know if you have any questions.
